dmca.title: DMCA Complaint from Lace to Leather
dmca.body:
September 21, 2006 

Patti Norton
234 North 5th Street 
Port Hueneme CA 93041 
805 488-7445
contact@lacetoleather.com

Google, Inc.
Attn Blogger Legal Support, DMCA complaints 
1500. Amphitheatre Pkwy
Mountain View, CA 94043 

Dear Sirs:

The blog secretstoebay.blogspot.com contains much of the content from my website word for word. There is no question that this is my content my website is given as the source on two of the five posts, and a link to my site is given on all five posts. My web pages are also listed on web.archive.org back to April 2000, and are registered with the US. Copyright Office.

Since each of the posts does have a link to my site, I am not totally opposed to them remaining on secretstoebay.blogspot. But I do ask that these posts either be removed or only left as short descriptions with links IF AND ONLY IF this amount of duplication will hurt the standings of my own site in your search engine listings.

The posts in question are listed below including the url from lacetoleather.com containing the copyrighted text and the url from secretstoebay.blogspot.com with the date, title, post author, and post time. The listings are separated by url and date. 

All of the web pages of mine that were copied can also be found indexed on
http://lacetoleather.com/ebaucsecforb.html.

http://lacetoleather.com/whenisbestim.html
http://secretstoebay.blogspot.com/2006_07_01_secretstoebay_archive_html 
Tuesday, July 04, 200&

posted by Michael Hepden @ 11:54 AM 
Source: Rainbow Ridens Trading Post

http://lacetoleather.com/winebay.html
http://secretstoebay.blogspot.com/2006_01_01_secretstoebay_archive_html

Friday, June 23, 2008 
How To Get The Highest Price
posted by Michael Hepden @ 11:32 AM 
Source: Ebay Auction Secrets

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law. 
I swear under penalty of perjury that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed. 

Respectfully submitted,
[signed]
Patti Norton
